Buckhorn Springs The Private Golf Course and Country Club in Brandon / Valrico Buckhorn Springs is a private golf course rich in tradition.

In fact, Buckhorn is the oldeBrandon / Valrico area.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year.

In 1962, a group of businessmen in the Brandon / Valrico area had a dream to build a country club in a “country” setting. After several years of planning and carefully selecting a site, the final location was selected in February of 1966. The site was chosen for its beauty and natural features, which include natural springs and an elevation as high as 90 feet above sea level (the highest point in Hillsborough County). The grove and pastures were purchased from the Mulrennen family, Frank Emerin Jr., William Smith, and John A. Brandywie. Some of the owners even held original land grants from the president of the United States. Designed by Harris Green

In fact, Buckhorn is the oldeBrandon / Valrico area.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year.

Since opening, the course has developed into a welcoming club with many active members. Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club features 18 challenging holes, active men’s and women’s associations, a fully-stocked golf shop, and the best “blue tee” game in the Tampa Bay area. Schedule A Tour In 2011, Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club was purchased by Brandon local and longtime member, William H. Harper.

In fact, Buckhorn is the oldeBrandon / Valrico area.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year.

An ultra-successful businessman, Bill Harper has established numerous businesses over the years, and is currently involved in six different companies he and his son, Steve, have started. Bill Harper is continuing to build the prestige of Buckhorn Springs and is bringing on new changes and improvements, including beautifying the clubhouse and golf course and expanding the clubs social events. Buckhorn Springs is a private golf course in the Brandon area.

Nunc aliquet nunc sapien, eu accumsan volutpat sem

It features a full training facility, PGA certified instructors, a fully-stocked golf shop, a swimming pool and tennis courts, weekly social events, and much more. For more information about Buckhorn, contact our staff today at (813) 689-7766 ext. 6. WEEKLY EVENTS Learn More EXCITING TOURNAMENTS Find Out More BEAUTIFUL VENUE See For Yourself See All That We Have to Offer Are You Ready to Become a Member of Our Community? See What Our Members Have to Say Went here for our school's end of year luncheon and everything was great! They helped us set up, the service and food was great. We will definitely be back next year! ‍Shelley R. One of the best places to practice or play. Great track, terrific grounds keeping crew and pro-shop staff. My friends and I have experiences at other Tampa Bay courses that just can't measure up. ‍Christopher L. This course has some of the finest conditions in Hillsborough county, most notably the consistent and fast greens. the membership is friendly and the staff is as well. Club Pro and GM are top shelf as well. Every time i tee it up, the have made some improvement to the course our to the facilities! Well done. ‍Michael G. Beautiful course, well maintained and challenging for beginners to intermittent golf enthusiasts. ‍Bill D.

Host Your Next Event Here!

Special Events A Beautiful Venue for Any Occasion Scenic Views & A Beautiful Space Make Buckhorn Springs the Site of an Event You’ll Remember Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club features a spacious and recently remodeled clubhouse, beautifully manicured grounds, and stunning views from the highest elevation in Hillsborough County. You’ll find that our warm atmosphere and first-class amenities make our venue the perfect place to host an event that you and your guests won’t soon forget. And, as a full-service event venue, we can assist you with planning, catering, service staff, and much more to ensure your event is a resounding success. Contact Us Host Your Wedding Reception, Corporate Event, or Private Event Here The event professionals at Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club are ready to help make your event something special. Whether you trust us with hosting your wedding day, an important business conference, or a loved one’s birthday party, we’ll be standing by to help you plan and execute the perfect event. Let’s get started. WEDDING RECEPTIONS Learn More CORPORATE EVENTS More Information PRIVATE EVENTS See More See for Yourself Why Buckhorn Springs Is the Perfect Venue for Your Next Event See What Our Members Have to Say Went here for our school's end of year luncheon and everything was great! They helped us set up, the service and food was great. We will definitely be back next year! ‍Shelley R. One of the best places to practice or play. Great track, terrific grounds keeping crew and pro-shop staff. My friends and I have experiences at other Tampa Bay courses that just can't measure up. ‍Christopher L. This course has some of the finest conditions in Hillsborough county, most notably the consistent and fast greens. the membership is friendly and the staff is as well. Club Pro and GM are top shelf as well. Every time i tee it up, the have made some improvement to the course our to the facilities! Well done. ‍Michael G. Beautiful course, well maintained and challenging for beginners to intermittent golf enthusiasts. ‍Bill D.

Private Golf and Country Club Memberships For Our Exclusive Course in the Brandon Area Buckhorn Springs is the oldest private golf and country club in the Brandon / Valrico area. In 1966 the location for Buckhorn Springs was chosen for its stunning natural environment, which includes natural springs and an elevation of 90 feet above sea level (the highest point in Hillsborough Country). Add in a beautiful clubhouse, talented golf instructors, and sincere camaraderie, and it is not a surprise that Buckhorn remains the premier golf course in Brandon. Individual Membership

In fact, Buckhorn is the oldeBrandon / Valrico area.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year. Take A Tour Of Our Course Family Membership

In fact, Buckhorn is the oldeBrandon / Valrico area.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year.

Our upgraded option gives married couples full privileges to our clubhouse, pool area, tennis courts, and social events. Schedule A Tour Corporate Membership

In fact, Buckhorn is the oldeBrandon / Valrico area.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year.

This membership gives one company full privileges to Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club amenities, such as swimming pool and tennis courts. Spouses and children are able to play unlimited golf if they pay a guest fee. Take A Tour Of Our Course Social Membership

In fact, Buckhorn is the oldeBrandon / Valrico area.

Our standard membership, which gives full access to our course, clubhouse amenities, and events throughout the year.

With this membership option, the member and spouse get full privileges to clubhouse amenities, including pool area and tennis courts, as well as entrance to seasonal and weekly social events. Schedule A Tour

With our wide variety of memberships, you can count on Buckhorn Springs when you want relaxation and entertainment for the entire family. Along with golf amenities, our clubhouse features a swimming pool, tennis courts, weekly dinners, and special events. For more information about our membership options, golf course pro shop , and clubhouse amenities, contact us today. We invite you to stop by for a tour of our facility and to see our rolling greens in person. Don’t forget to ask about our golf lessons, taught by our PGA and LPGA certified instructors. The Perfect Corporate Venue for Your Next Event in the Brandon & Valrico, FL, Area – Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club is the ideal corporate venue for all of your business functions in the Brandon and Valrico, FL, area. Whether you’re looking for a quiet and comfortable place to meet with your executive board or you want to plan a lively company golf outing to build employee morale, we have everything you need to organize a successful and enjoyable event. Here are some of the different types of functions that we can host if you need a corporate venue for your business events in the Brandon and Valrico area: Corporate luncheons Business meetings Seminars Charity fundraisers Golf outings And more When you choose to have your corporate event at Buckhorn Springs, you will receive the same unmatched level of service that we provide for our valued members every day. In addition, our in-house culinary team will be available to provide a variety of delightful catering options to accompany your meeting. No matter what type of function you are holding, our personalized care, creative cuisine, and seamless service are sure to impress all of your business associates. For more information about the event facilities and services that we can provide when you need a corporate venue for your business in Brandon, Valrico, or any other nearby community in Florida, contact Buckhorn Springs today. The Perfect Venue for Your Next Private Event in the Brandon & Valrico, FL, Area – Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club If you’re looking for a venue for your next event, look no further than Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club. As a private country club in the Brandon and Valrico, FL, area that is available for hosting public events and gatherings, we offer a wide array of outstanding banquet amenities and services. When you choose Buckhorn Springs as the venue for your event, we will be there to help you every step of the way. From picking out table and chair coverings to choosing between the variety of delightful menu options that can be prepared by our in-house culinary team, we will use our many years of experience to help you create the event that you have always dreamed of hosting. What’s more, once you give us a list of everything you need, you can relax and prepare to enjoy your function knowing that our professional hospitality staff will take care of all the details. With facilities that can hold up to 150 guests for a seated function and up to 200 guests for a cocktail reception, we can accommodate a number of different types of events for residents of Brandon, Valrico, and any other nearby community, including: Weddings Charity galas Birthday parties Bridal and baby showers Anniversary celebrations Graduation parties Corporate functions And more For more information about the amenities and services that you can enjoy when you choose our venue for your next event, contact Buckhorn Springs today. We are the venue of choice for residents of Brandon and Valrico, Florida who are looking for a country club for weddings and other special events.
